articles.title: Here's Why the Nintendo Switch 2, Mario Kart World, and Everything Around Them Is So Expensive - IGN
articles.description: The Nintendo Switch 2 costs $450 and Mario Kart World is $80. No one's especially happy about this, but why is Nintendo charging this much? We asked the experts.

articles.title: Shoppers are snapping up Hudson's Bay 'stripes' products - BBC
articles.description: As Canada's Hudson's Bay Company faces an end to its 355-year legacy, shoppers are scrambling for anything with its iconic "stripes".

articles.title: Street Fighter 6's summer update for Switch 2 could improve frame rates and input delay for all platforms - EventHubs
articles.description: There's an update coming to Street Fighter 6 around the time the Nintendo Switch 2 version is launched, which is set for June 5th, 2025. Because the Switch 2 version of Street Fighter 6 will feature crossplay, all versions ...

articles.title: Xbox’s new free RPG is a massive hit, and we can see why - GAMINGbible
articles.description: Play this new RPG hit on Xbox Game Pass for free.

articles.title: Mario Kart World Removes Controversial Mario Kart 8 Feature - ComicBook.com
articles.description: Mario Kart World on Switch 2 is set to remove a controversial Mario Kart 8 feature when it releases alongside the console this June.

articles.title: Metroid Prime 4 Switch 2 vs. Switch 1 comparison, Street Fighter 6 Switch 2 vs. PS5 vs. PS4 comparison - Nintendo Everything
